item.title: [Python] Differences that C# engineers felt when they first learned python
item.description: Hi, this is [Muscle Training Clinical Engineering Engineer ken](https://twitter.com/ce_fitness_note). This is my first post on Qiita. I usually use C# to develop medical systems. I decided to focus on machine learning, so I started learning python. Even though I learned about it, I went around Progate’s python course, but I will briefly summarize the differences between C# and how to write. If you usually use C#, C++, VB and want to learn python from now on, I think that learning will be better if you know the difference between the two in advance.
